main.description:
Seamless, inspiring and meaningful

Ink an important contract or seal the deal in an environment that does the job right.

Nowadays, meetings are not limited to stiff suit-and-tie venues. From floor-to-ceiling glass windows to sweeping views of a tropical paradise, a whole world of inspiration arises beyond the four walls of a boardroom.

Have a look at our extensive portfolio of meeting spaces for a productive and memorable exchange of ideas.

venues.title: Discovery Suites
venues.description:
It’s all about the execution. All rooms are fully equipped with state-of-the-art facilities that seamlessly blend modern convenience with productivity. Sweeping views of the city skyline give the average business meeting an extraordinary touch. 

Allow our team of professionals to curate a personalized and unforgettable experience tailored to your needs and preferences.

venues.title: Discovery Primea
venues.description: Located in the heart of Makati, guests can focus on the business at hand with a dedicated concierge and IT butlers who will cater to every whim. The rooms feature premium amenities, including boardroom tables with media panels, meant for a conducive working environment. The exclusive number of meeting venues assures personalized and bespoke attention for every group.

Destinations

Discerning planners can pull off a definitive power meeting in Boracay - the perfect setting for work and play. Comfortable venues, delightful cuisine, and unobtrusive yet dependable service make for a productive conference. Destinations

An exclusive island set in paradise, Discovery Coron offers a peaceful location for business, designed to enhance the meeting process. With its inspiring setting, excellent facilities, and heartfelt service, the island is a powerful tool to make work feel as relaxing as possible.

Destinations

Draw inspiration from the captivating outdoor surroundings of Discovery Samal. The resort is endowed with private function rooms and delectable dining options that are ideal for your team’s power meetings and essential productivity needs. 

Our dedicated Meeting Specialists are ready to assist you with the planning of your customized event that's perfectly tailored to meet your specific needs.

Destinations

Where the magic of nature's charm ignites fresh ideas. Foster collaboration through meaningful and open dialogues. Host your meetings amidst nature's sanctuary, where inspiring spaces spark renewed perspective.

Where the magic of nature's charm ignites fresh ideas. Foster collaboration through meaningful and open dialogues. Host your meetings amidst nature's sanctuary, where inspiring spaces spark renewed perspective.

Conventions

Presenting the largest convention center in Davao, Discovery Samal houses the Caracoles Convention Center. The state-of-the-art facility that can accommodate 1,200 guests is best suited for social gatherings of any scale, from multi-day conferences to galas. 

Allow us to collaborate with you in crafting the event precisely to your preferences. Get in touch with our event planning team.

main.description:
Sophisticated. Stylish. Seamless.

Exchange your wedding vows with a flair of metropolitan charm in two of the most iconic cities in the Philippines. Experience the magic of urban weddings, where you make every moment a picturesque celebration in seamless sophistication.

venues.title: Discovery Primea
venues.description:
Go for an ultra-luxe wedding celebration in the heart of the Makati district for a sensational milestone to remember. 

Discovery Primea offers highly personalized service, exquisite design, modern facilities, and gastronomic specialties for discerning couples.

venues.title: Discovery Suites
venues.description:
Revel at the panoramic view of the metro, right at the center of the Ortigas Business District. 

More than the breathtaking views from the top, Discovery Suites offers a personalized, seamless experience that aims to bring you comfort and convenience as you take your steps towards 'I do'.

attributes.value:

Discovery Primea offers highly personalized service, exquisite design, modern facilities, and gastronomic specialties for discerning couples.

Exquisitely chic

Contemporary yet classic, simple yet sophisticated. Getting wed in the city is a fabulous way to bring family and friends together. Impeccable service, gorgeous flower arrangements, and dazzling skylines put the cherry on top of the fantastic wedding fete you’ve always dreamed of.

Located in the heart of Makati, guests can focus on the business at hand with a dedicated concierge and IT butlers who will cater to every whim. The rooms feature premium amenities, including boardroom tables with media panels, meant for a conducive working environment. The exclusive number of meeting venues assures personalized and bespoke attention for every group.

Revel at the panoramic view of the metro, right at the center of the Ortigas Business District. 

More than the breathtaking views from the top, Discovery Suites offers a personalized, seamless experience that aims to bring you comfort and convenience as you take your steps towards 'I do'.

main.description:
Serene. Intimate. Breathtaking.

Celebrate your love amidst stunning nature landscapes in the most iconic Philippine locations and create everlasting memories with a destination wedding tailored just for you.

venues.title: Discovery Boracay
venues.description: Celebrate in style at Discovery Boracay. We make your dream wedding come true with the award island's renowned beachfront glamour as your canvas while you exchange vows in our intimate spaces, providing modern convenience and luxury within reach.

venues.title: Discovery Coron
venues.description:
Tie the knot on a secluded island all to your own, as Coron’s cerulean waters and pristine white sand make for a picture-perfect backdrop. 

Couples looking for exclusivity and intimacy will love the hidden beaches and precious spots around the island.

venues.title: Discovery Samal
venues.description:
An ideal wedding destination in the Island Garden City of Samal for couples seeking to enjoy intimacy, privacy, and romance. Discovery Samal offers you the option to exchange your much-awaited vows by the coast with a majestic view of the calm seas as your witness or embrace the solemnity of the occasion at the quaint very own Divine Grace Chapel, sitting at the resort's highest point. Specialized services for Muslim, Indian, Christian, and Catholic weddings are available. 

The tropical resort also houses the largest convention center in Davao with a capacity for 1,200 guests, making it an ideal place to host your festivities with large crowds.

venues.title: Manami Resort
venues.description:
Amidst the elaborate flora and ravishing fauna, Manami Resort is a dreamy wedding destination. Through the green groves, pristine shorelines, and serene cosmos of the ocean, the absolute aura of this distinct haven sets the magic in intimate celebrations. Let nature be a part of the beginning of a new journey of life as vows are expressed and deep affections are celebrated. 

Take in captivating moments through the romantic open footprints that nurture new stories. Every interaction is heightened and brought to refined meaning.

Celebrate in style at Discovery Boracay. We make your dream wedding come true with the award island's renowned beachfront glamour as your canvas while you exchange vows in our intimate spaces, providing modern convenience and luxury within reach.

A sun-kissed “I Do”

Beach weddings are meant to be easy breezy, a fun and relaxing celebration for the couple and their guests. From the world-famous white sand of Boracay to the astonishing sunsets of Palawan, booking your ideal wedding has never been more romantic.

Discerning planners can pull off a definitive power meeting in Boracay - the perfect setting for work and play. Comfortable venues, delightful cuisine, and unobtrusive yet dependable service make for a productive conference. Meetings at the shores have never been this remarkable.

main.description:
Stunning. Outstanding. Awe-inspiring.

Dream it, and we’ll make it happen: social gatherings are our specialty. 

Let your imagination run free while we do the essentials. We bring diversity and energy to all our catering and offer everything from lavish banquets, live cooking station, to intimate cocktails.

venues.title: Discovery Boracay
venues.description:
Toast under the warm glow of the sun or dance beneath the stars with Boracay’s famous powdery white sand as your dancefloor. 

Bringing an exciting gourmet edge to your event, our talented culinary team are expert when it comes to creative menus inspired by coastal cuisine.

venues.title: Discovery Coron
venues.description:
Enjoy the exclusivity of an island, with hidden beaches, secret picnic spots, and isolated neighboring islands. Discovery Coron, previously known as Club Paradise Palawan, boasts of its white sand beaches, an abundance of floral and fauna, and thrilling dive sites that will make your next social affair a colorful one. 

Have the option to enjoy indoor and outdoor activities alike. Go for a quiet nature walk, explore the marine life. Whether it's a birthday, wedding, anniversary, or company outing, our team can curate a personalized celebration that's tailor-fit for your needs.

venues.title: Discovery Samal
venues.description:
Housing the largest convention center in Davao, Discovery Samal makes an ideal location to host your next social festivities. From birthdays to debuts to various social gatherings, you can transform our multiple event spaces into the vision you desire. Choose between our indoor and outdoor spaces; throw a barefoot beach party celebration by the fine white sandy shores, or showcase a stylish celebration in our spacious function rooms. 

With the pristine beachfront and the stunning sunset as your backdrop, combined with the genuine care brought by our team, you're off to set the trend for a unique tropical island celebration.

venues.title: Discovery Suites
venues.description: Ready for any request, our highly trained team of event specialists will do what it takes to make your event a success. Enjoy skyline views of the pulsating city while you toast to a memorable bash.

venues.title: Discovery Primea
venues.description:
From deluxe staycations, close-knit get-togethers to grand events, Discovery Primea can cater for all occasions. The expert culinary team aims to delight with bespoke menus, immaculately presented dishes and mouth-watering cuisine. 

The venue’s elegant design coupled with modernized facilities make for a marvelous fete.

venues.title: Manami Resort
venues.description:
Where nature's charming elegance blends seamlessly with the warmth of local hospitality. 

Here at Manami Resort, we believe each milestone, big or small, is worth gathering for. Captivate your senses with moments that matter along with an exceptional spread of culinary treasures. Our curated spaces are ready to host your next social affair.
